item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“MajorPro, post:2, topic:430285”]Well, if you want the entire map to be the wilderness…

public boolean inWild() { if(inSafeSpot()) { return false; } else { return true; } } [/quote]

Thanks I’ll try that

item.title: Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @MajorPro MajorPro
item.description:
@MajorPro wrote:

Well, if you want the entire map to be the wilderness…

public boolean inWild() {
  if(inSafeSpot()) {
    return false;
  } else {
    return true;
  }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

I used this code to make the whole map wilderness and obviously it doesn’t work.
What are the coords to make the enitre map the wild.

[code] public boolean inWild() {

if(inSafeSpot()) {
	return false;
	}

	if(absX > 0 && absX < 0 && absY > 0 && absY < 0) {	
	return true;
	}
	return false;
}[/code]

Read full topic
